content: द्रविणं [द्रु-इनन्; <ls>Uṇ. 2. 50</ls>] {@--1@} Wealth, money, property, substance; <ls>Ve. 3. 20</ls>; <ls>Pt. 3. 174</ls>; <ls>Bv. 4. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Gold; <ls>R. 4. 70.</ls> {@--3@} Strength, power. {@--4@} Valour, prowess. {@--5@} A thing, matter, material. {@--6@} That of which anything is made. {@--7@} A wish, desire.
